client_description_Summary_Note:
Fournier Gauthier Boucher and the RM were introduced at a gourmet food festival in Berlin. They shared a love for culinary arts and decided to explore investment opportunities in the food industry together.
Fournier Gauthier Boucher is a 23 year old and comes from Germany.
Seeking a trusted partner for wealth management, he joined Julius Baer for its comprehensive and tailored services.
client_description_Family_Background: Fournier Gauthier Boucher is currently single. He does not have any children.
client_description_Education_Background:
Fournier obtained his secondary school diploma from Lycée Janson-de-Sailly in 2019.
He then attended ESSEC Business School, which he graduated in 2024.
client_description_Occupation_History:
Fournier Gauthier Boucher is a 23 year old and comes from Germany.
Fournier Gauthier Boucher did not start his professional career yet.
client_description_Wealth_Summary:
He did not manage to save any money during his career.
Client does not have any properties.
Following the passing of his grandmother, a successful Hedge Fund Manager, he received an inheritance of 1160000 EUR in 2016, which he has used to secure his financial future.
client_description_Client_Summary: The RM is committed to helping Fournier achieve financial success and security as he embarks on his professional journey.
